cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okiagaru

sentence.kanji: 弟はようやくベッドから起き上がった。
sentence.romaji: otouto ha youyaku bedo kara okiagata。
sentence.english: Finally my younger brother got out of bed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chiri

sentence.kanji: 彼は地理に詳しいの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha chiri ni kuwashii no
sentence.english: He's knowledgeable in geography.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zenshin

sentence.kanji: 一列に並んで前進して下さい。
sentence.romaji: ichiretsu ni narande zenshin shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please form a line and proceed forwards.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakusa

sentence.kanji: 貧富の格差が大きくなっているな。
sentence.romaji: hinpu no kakusa ga ookiku nate iru na
sentence.english: The gap between rich and poor is growing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's usugi

sentence.kanji: 子供たちは冬でも薄着で通します。
sentence.romaji: kodomotachi ha fuyu de mo usugi de tooshimasu
sentence.english: The kids are dressed lightly even through the winter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atsugi

sentence.kanji: 普段から厚着しないようにしています。
sentence.romaji: fudan kara atsugi shinai you ni shite imasu
sentence.english: I usually try not to wear heavy clothes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaisatsu

sentence.kanji: 改札で3時に会おう。
sentence.romaji: kaisatsu de sanji ni aou
sentence.english: Let's meet at the ticket gate at 3 o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ba

sentence.kanji: この場でお礼を言わせてください。
sentence.romaji: kono ba de orei wo iwasete kudasai
sentence.english: Please let me take this opportunity to offer my gratitude.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dokuritsu

sentence.kanji: 先日会社から独立しました。
sentence.romaji: senjitsu kaisha kara dokuritsu shimashita
sentence.english: I created my own company the other day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dokutoku

sentence.kanji: 彼の服のセンスは独特よね。
sentence.romaji: kare no fuku no sensu ha dokutoku yo ne
sentence.english: His sense of style is unique.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitorigoto

sentence.kanji: 彼女はいつも独り言を言うんだ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha itsumo hitorigoto wo iu n da
sentence.english: She always talks to herself.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dokusen

sentence.kanji: この2社が市場を独占しています。
sentence.romaji: kono 2 sha ga shijou wo dokusen shite imasu
sentence.english: These two companies monopolize the market.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ika

sentence.kanji: あの一家は仲がいい。
sentence.romaji: ano ika ha naka ga ii
sentence.english: That family is very close.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jimi

sentence.kanji: 今日、彼女は地味な服装をしていますね。
sentence.romaji: kyou kanojo ha jimi na fukusou wo shite imasu ne
sentence.english: She's modestly dressed today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyoka

sentence.kanji: 先生に許可をもらって早退しました。
sentence.romaji: sensei ni kyoka wo morate soutai shimashita
sentence.english: I got permission from the teacher and left early.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zatsudan

sentence.kanji: その先生はいつも授業の前に雑談をするの。
sentence.romaji: sono sensei ha itsumo jugyou no mae ni zatsudan wo suru no
sentence.english: The teacher always chats before the class.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zatsuon

sentence.kanji: 雑音がひどくて声が聞こえません。
sentence.romaji: zatsuon ga hidokute koe ga kikoemasen
sentence.english: The background noise is awful and I can't hear your voice.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kigen

sentence.kanji: 言葉の起源に大変興味があります。
sentence.romaji: kotoba no kigen ni taihen kyoumi ga arimasu
sentence.english: I am very interested in the origins of words.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kankyaku

sentence.kanji: 観客は興奮していたよ。
sentence.romaji: kankyaku ha koufun shite ita yo
sentence.english: The spectators became excited.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chiten

sentence.kanji: もうすぐ目標の地点に到達します。
sentence.romaji: mousugu mokuhyou no chiten ni toutatsu shimasu
sentence.english: We'll soon be arriving at our destination.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okosu

sentence.kanji: 彼は暴力事件を起こしたんだよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha bouryoku jiken wo okoshita n da yo
sentence.english: He caused a violent incident.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keni

sentence.kanji: 博士はその道の権威です。
sentence.romaji: hakase ha sonomichi no keni desu
sentence.english: The doctor is an authority in that field.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chihou

sentence.kanji: この地方は漁業が盛んです。
sentence.romaji: kono chihou ha gyogyou ga sakan desu
sentence.english: The fishing industry is flourishing in this region.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tashikameru

sentence.kanji: 母はお釣りを確かめたの。
sentence.romaji: haha ha otsuri wo tashikameta no
sentence.english: My mother checked the change.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mushi

sentence.kanji: 庭で秋の虫が鳴いているね。
sentence.romaji: niwa de aki no mushi ga naite iru ne
sentence.english: The autumn insects are chirping in the garden.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dentou

sentence.kanji: 午後5時には電灯がつきます。
sentence.romaji: gogo 5 ji ni ha dentou ga tsukimasu
sentence.english: The light will be turned on at 5:00 pm.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yokujitsu

sentence.kanji: 翌日、彼に会いに行きました。
sentence.romaji: yokujitsu kare ni ai ni ikimashita
sentence.english: I went to see him the next day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yokuasa

sentence.kanji: 翌朝は快晴だったね。
sentence.romaji: yokuasa ha kaisei data ne
sentence.english: The weather was fine the next morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ichiba

sentence.kanji: 市場で新鮮な魚を買ってきました。
sentence.romaji: ichiba de shinsen na sakana wo kate kimashita
sentence.english: I bought some fresh fish at the market.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's azayaka

sentence.kanji: 山は鮮やかな緑でした。
sentence.romaji: yama ha azayaka na midori deshita
sentence.english: The mountain was a vivid green.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hadagi

sentence.kanji: 寒いので暖かい肌着を着ました。
sentence.romaji: samui no de atatakai hadagi wo kimashita
sentence.english: I was cold so I put on some warm underwear.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ichou

sentence.kanji: 彼は胃腸が強くありません。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ichou ga tsuyoku arimasen
sentence.english: His digestive system is not strong.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chou

sentence.kanji: 彼は腸の手術を受けたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha chou no shujutsu wo uketa no
sentence.english: He had an operation on his intestines.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bochi

sentence.kanji: 寺のとなりに墓地があります。
sentence.romaji: tera no tonari ni bochi ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's a graveyard next to the temple.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jiko

sentence.kanji: これからは自己の判断で行動してください。
sentence.romaji: kore kara ha jiko no handan de koudou shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please act on your own judgment from now on.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's houchou

sentence.kanji: 包丁で指を切った。
sentence.romaji: houchou de yubi wo kita
sentence.english: I cut my finger with a kitchen knife.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsutsumi

sentence.kanji: この包みは誰のですか。
sentence.romaji: kono tsutsumi ha dare no desu ka
sentence.english: Whose parcel is this?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yome

sentence.kanji: 姉が嫁に行ったの。
sentence.romaji: ane ga yome ni ita no
sentence.english: My big sister got married.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukeru

sentence.kanji: 玄関に車を着けます。
sentence.romaji: genkan ni kuruma wo tsukemasu
sentence.english: I'll bring the car to the door.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's togeru

sentence.kanji: この会社は急成長を遂げました。
sentence.romaji: kono kaisha ha kyuuseichou wo togemashita
sentence.english: This company has achieved rapid growth.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaizou

sentence.kanji: 首相は内閣の改造を行いました。
sentence.romaji: shushou ha naikaku no kaizou wo okonaimashita
sentence.english: The Prime Minister reshuffled the Cabinet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dentaku

sentence.kanji: この電卓はポケットに入ります。
sentence.romaji: kono dentaku ha poketo ni hairimasu
sentence.english: This calculator fits in your pocket.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aseru

sentence.kanji: 何をそんなに焦っているのですか。
sentence.romaji: nani wo sonnani asete iru no desu ka
sentence.english: What are you in such a hurry for?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kogeru

sentence.kanji: シチューが焦げたよー。
sentence.romaji: shichu- ga kogeta yo-
sentence.english: The stew burnt.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaiyou

sentence.kanji: その昔航海士達は未踏の地を求め海洋に乗り出しました。
sentence.romaji: sono mukashi koukaishitachi ha mitou no chi wo motome kaiyou ni noridashimashita
sentence.english: In the past, sailors ventured into the ocean in search of unexplored lands.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sentou

sentence.kanji: 銭湯は昔より少なくなったわね。
sentence.romaji: sentou ha mukashi yori sukunaku nata wa ne
sentence.english: There are fewer public bathhouses today than there used to be.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mesu

sentence.kanji: この猫は雌です。
sentence.romaji: kono neko ha mesu desu
sentence.english: This cat is a female.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jigoku

sentence.kanji: 地震の後、街は地獄のようだったよ。
sentence.romaji: jishin no ato machi ha jigoku no you data yo
sentence.english: After the earthquake, the town looked like hell.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bokujou

sentence.kanji: 叔父は牧場を持っているんだ。
sentence.romaji: oji ha bokujou wo mote iru n da
sentence.english: My uncle has a ranch.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shouten

sentence.kanji: 焦点を絞って話しましょう。
sentence.romaji: shouten wo shibote hanashimashou
sentence.english: Let's focus on the matter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's niji

sentence.kanji: 雨が上がって美しい虹が出たね。
sentence.romaji: ame ga agate utsukushii niji ga deta ne 。
sentence.english: The rain stopped and a beautiful rainbow came out.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sasu

sentence.kanji: 雨が降ってきたので傘を差しました。
sentence.romaji: ame ga fute kita no de kasa wo sashimashita
sentence.english: I opened my umbrella as it started to rain.
